TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PlatformAttribute extends NUnit.Framework.IncludeExcludeAttribute implements class NUnit.Framework.Internal.IApplyToTest

Docs.summary: PlatformAttribute is used to mark a test fixture or an individual method as applying to a particular platform only.
